seed_pair.target: Eso fue una sorpresa, porque es mi amigo.
seed_pair.known: That was a surprise, because he's my friend.

S0120: Es interesante que te guste ir en autobús.
It's interesting that you like to go by bus.
S0121: Es inusual que no te guste usar tu auto.
It's unusual that you don't like to use your car.
S0122: Está empezando a sentirse más fácil y estoy entusiasmado por cómo va.
It's starting to feel easier and I'm excited about how it's going.
S0123: Pienso que eso es una buena idea.
I think that's a good idea.
S0124: Creí que eso era una buena idea.
I thought that was a good idea.
S0125: Creo que tu idea era muy buena.
I believe that your idea was very good.
S0126: Este trabajo está cambiando la forma de mi cerebro.
This work is changing the shape of my brain.
S0127: Eso no es por qué quería verte.
That isn't why I wanted to see you.
S0128: You're like someone I used to know.
S0129: Estoy tan feliz de que te vaya tan bien.
I'm so happy that you're doing so well.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
